title: Stock Market Today: Dow Edges Up; Retail Sales Grow More Than Expected — Live Updates
snippet: Trump's tariffs continue to affect the global economy. Follow along for live updates on the Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq and other markets.

title: US Retail Sales Beat Forecasts in Sign of Solid Summer Spending
snippet: US retail sales rose in August for a third month in a broad advance, rounding out a summer of resilient spending.

subnews.snippet: Americans still opened their wallets last month, despite persistent fears about the economy, a slowing labor market and higher tariffs.
